title: Plotting the Hist object
weight: 2
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(openMSE)
OM <- new("OM", Albacore, Generic_IncE, Imprecise_Biased, Perfect_Imp)
myHist <- Simulate(OM, silent=TRUE)
output_dir <- '../../../static/'
plot(myHist, output_dir=output_dir, open=FALSE)
```

The `plot` function creates an HTML report with plots of the dynamics of the historical spool-up period:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
plot(myHist)
```

See [this HTML report](/Hist.html) for an example Hist report. 

See the [help documentation](https://msetool.openmse.com/reference/plot.Hist.html) or type `?plot.Hist` in the R console for more information on plotting `Hist` objects.
